body:
Comment 8: 
Please do this:

1) change to goinstall source directory
cd $GOROOT/src/cmd/goinstall

2) delete the file
make clean

3) make sure it is gone
ls -l goinstall.exe

4) build it again
make all

5) make sure it is there (send us the output)
ls -l goinstall.exe

6) run it
./goinstall.exe -v github.com/dchest/gotweet/src

also, please tell us what

8g -V

say. Thank you.

Alex
